price: "Kuma yãyã nake jin tsõron abin da kuka yi shirki da shi, kuma ba ku tsõron cẽwa lalle ne kũ, kun yi shirki da Allah, abin da (Allah) bai saukar da wata hujja ba game da shi? To, wane ɓangare daga sãshen biyu ne mafi cancanta da aminci, idan kun kasance kunã sani?"
arabic: وَكَيۡفَ أَخَافُ مَآ أَشۡرَكۡتُمۡ وَلَا تَخَافُونَ أَنَّكُمۡ أَشۡرَكۡتُم بِٱللَّهِ مَا لَمۡ يُنَزِّلۡ بِهِۦ عَلَيۡكُمۡ سُلۡطَٰنٗاۚ فَأَيُّ ٱلۡفَرِيقَيۡنِ أَحَقُّ بِٱلۡأَمۡنِۖ إِن كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wakayfa akhāfu mā ashraktum walā takhāfūna annakum ashraktum bil-lahi mā lam yunazzil bihi ʿalaykum sul'ṭānan fa-ayyu al-farīqayni aḥaqqu bil-amni in kuntum taʿlamūna
